All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Category
Represents the categories in the menu.
Invoice
An invoice is created whenever payment transaction is done for order made by customer.
InvoiceCalculator
 
InvoicePrinterMessage
An invoice printer is used to print invoice whenever customer makes payment.
Menu
Handle all the menu related objects, AKA Menu Manager Add/Edit/Delete Contains MenuItems, PromoItems and Category
MenuItem
Represents a item in the menu.
Order
An order is created to record all the dishes that a customer ordered.
OrderList
A list to store all the orders.
PromoItem
Represents a promotion in the menu.
Reservation
The class represent a reservation made in the Restaurant Reservation Point of Sale System.
ReservationManager
The class handles all reservations.
RestaurantReservationPOS
The main entry point of the Restaurant Reservation Point of Sale System.
SaleReportManager
The class handles all sales report in the restaurant.
Staff
A staff is a person who works in the restaurant.
StaffList
A list to store all staffs' information.
Table
The class represent a table in the restaurant.
TableManager
The class handles all tables in the restaurant.
